div.p:
Curia gilde burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Nono die
mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Sexto

Dauid menyheis
Johannes ruthirfurd miles
gilbertus menyeis

Johannes lesly de Warderis

thomas chamer

Jacobus collisoun'

Johannes Ratre
Alexander gray
Dauid mar
Andreas murray
Willelmus portar
Willelmus futhes
Willelmus Wormet
georgius bisset
Robertus Crag
Johannes blak
matheus branche
Duncanus collisone
Patricius Reid

gilbert menyeis
Dauid menyeis
Alexander gray
Johnne of mar
William futhes
Dauid steuart
robert crag
Johnne lesly of Wardris sere Johne ruthirfurd
Johne of cullane
James colisone Duncan colisone
Alexander mar

gilbertus litster
Alexander malisone
Dauid fynne
Andreas meldrum
Andreas stevinsone
Alexander horne
Johannes Ramsay

div.head: Gustatores seruicie
div.p:
Evin quarter Johannes collisone
balliuus et andreas nachtj sergeandus
Patricius Ponty
Dauid fynne / gustatores

Crukit quarter thomas lesly
balliuus Normandus lesly sergeandus
Willelmus bonetmakar
Alexander tailyeour

Grene quartar thomas Wod'
balliuus Johannes cuk sergeandus
Alexander Donaldsone
Robertus fraser allutarius

ffuty quarter thomas Waus
balliuus Willelmus scimgeor sergeandus
Alexander Stablair'
Robertus strathachin

head.add: Auditores compotorum fabrice ecclesie et decanorum gilde

div.p:
Dauid menyeis
Johannes ruthirfurd' miles
gilbertus menyeis
Johannes Cullan
Alexander Reid'
Jacobus collison
Johannes mar

add.foreign: decanorum gilde et magistri fabrice ecclesia

div.p:
The said day Androu cullan Alderman this yeir and ane of the denys
of gild' the yer' bigan present and ingef his compt And' Alexander gray
master of the kirkwark gef In his compt of the yer' bigain to be considirit
and vndirstandin be the said Auditouris suorne tharto

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman baillies ande
counsaill that ane bailye and ane officiar sall pas' serche and seik the schippis
and all placez quhar ony talcht may be fundin barellit or pakit to pas'
withtout the Realme and Eschet the samyn eftir the tenour of the akis of oure
souerane lordis perliament maid' tharapone

The said day it was statut and ordanit that na fleschearis wif mak candle
to sell vndir the pain of Escheting of the samyn and breking of commone ordi
nance Ande that all candilmakaris withtin this burgh' sall mak sufficient
candill small wekit and weill dryit the li' for iij d' / one this wis' iiij
candillis for a penny tua candillis for a penny and a candill for a penny
vndir the pain of escheting of thar candillis and breking of common' ordinance

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the alderman bailyes and
counsail that ale baxtaris withtin this burgh' sale haue reddy breid of quhit
clene fresch' gu sufficient gud the tua penny breid weyand xxvj vnce
the penny bred xiij vnce for xv dais quhile thai be forthir auisit

The said day it was statut and ordanit that ale broustaris in this tovn
sale brewe prouabill aile for viij d' the galloun' and vnfree broustaris
for vj pennys the galloun'

The said day It was statut and ordanit that the alderman and gavane
of murray Dauid menyeis and William rolland Johnne lesly of Warderis and'
Androw fif ser Johnne ruthirfurd and William Wormet gilbert menyeis and John
of murray Johnne of cullan and richerd hill Johnne colisone and Dauy adamsoun'
Alexander red and Dauy mar Alexander mar and Johnne of mar James colisoun' and
robert crag Alexander gray and allan litstar thomas lesly and Johnne of murray
thomas Wod and malcom' crag thomas Waus and Dauid thomas Dauid ste
uart and Dauid Kintor Johnne ratre and patry red thomas chamer and mathowe
branche patry lesly and georg' bisset William futhes and thomas
Johnne' blak and Johnne Kintor patry chernsid and Dauy fynne Duncan'
colison' Dauy murray William portar and Johne' andirson Alexander malisoun' and
Robert Waus William murray and criste prat Johnne arthour Androw stevinsoun'

The said day It was statut and ordanit that ale quhit fische salbe present
to the mercat or ony be sellit vnder the pane of eschet and breking of common'
ordinance

The said day it was statut and ordanit that nay wittaile be houssit
vnder the pane of breking' of commone' ordinance

The said day It was staut and ordanit that nay svyne be fund
vtheuth' band and quhay may comprehend to scla thame quhar euere
thai may be fundin

The said day the hailtoun' consentit that four personis salbe chosin quhilkis
sale clengis and dicht the haile four partis of the toune and' hald It
clene as efferis and kerry the filth' tharof to thar commoun' myddingis for
the quhilkis Ilkane fir hous' sale pay to thame j penny in the yeir /
The said day

The said day the bilyes assignit monunday that nixt cumis to Dauid fynne
to preiwe that thomas tolly is his feit seruand for thre yeris

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid colp
forspekar that thomas tolly sale reman witht James colisoun' and mak
him seruice in his bait vnto a terme that the said James may be lauch
fully warnit that he may prouid for him self and optenit licence
fra the said James eftir the tenour of the actis and statutis maid
obefor

Eodem die Alexander nory fecit constituit et ordinauit matheum branche suum legitimum procuratorem
dans et concedens eidem suam liberam presentatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et
nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum ab Alexandro prat xxj s' et Inde acquitandum
Et si necesse fuerit prosequendum agendum defendendum et cetera promittens de Rato
et grato Cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die
mensis Octobris anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus skynnere alias ailhous amerciatur per confessionem lingue pro perturbio tho
me logy ac pro perturbio Andree low quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt Insuper
ordianatum fuit pro emenda per prepositum ballivos et consules quod dictus Willelmus peciet
veniam a dictis thoma et Andrea in curia ut Soluet dicto thome v s' et candelanj
Ceream dimidium li' ponderans faciet et eandum in dominica proxima sequenti Offeret ad lumen
Sancti sanguinis

add.foreign: deposiciones testium Inter Dauid fynne et thomam towy

div.p:
The said day Dauid archebalde deponit be his aithe that he was present quhene
Dauid fynne feit thome of touy for thre yeris and gaf to him j plak in arlis sua
that the said' Dauid keip the condicioun that he maid' him quhilkis he kennis nocht

The said' day Robert athoile deponit be his aithe he was besid' quhen Dauid fynne
feit thomas towy for this yer' to Cum and gaf him j plak in arlis and bad' him
gold' and Siluer to gif his botismen and he said' he wald' tak bot j plak for
his word' was als gud' to him as gold' and Siluer

The said' day thomas touy deponit be his aithe that he or a man for him suld' mak
seruice to Dauid fynne for half ane yer' fra the next Rud' day furtht he kepand'
to him his condicioun'

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit and chargit Johne Cuk officiar' to
keip the pane in his handis arrestit be Alexander gray quhile he be pait
to sere Johne chamer sex s' and viij d' of annuel aucht to him

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit thome of touy to serue
James Colisone quhile the rud' day nixt to Cum eftir the tenor of the
actis maid' Obefor And' norman leslie seriand' chargit the said' thomas to serue
the said' James to the said terme

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that thome of touy sale serue Dauid fynne for ane yer' eftir the next
rud' day hereftir and forthir gif law wile and that was gevin for dome

The said' day Norman leslie ar commavnde of the balyeis chargit thomas
touy to mak seruice to James Colisone quhile the nixt rud' day be his
wand' eftir the tenor of the actis maid' Obefor Ande the said' James
protestit for Costis skathtis dampnis and expensis gif he ony Sustenis throu
defalt of the said' thomas seruice and his men' that he may be recompen
sit tharof

The said' day Johne of Cullane requirit diuers' tymes the aldirman and balyeis
to put the actis of thar Court buk maid' one Androw Johnesone to dew
execucioun' And' the balyeis chargit and ordanit the four' sergeandis to tak
the said' Androw Johnesone quhar thai mycht comprehand' him and put him in the
tolbutht quhile Justice be ministerit equalie to the said' Johne

The said' day William vicar' was quyt of the changin of margaret litstaris
quorundam fische bettir' for war' becaus the said margret tuk to preiwe that
he hed changit hir fische and failyet in hir preiwe and that was gevin
for dome'

Eodem die cristinus prat fecit creauit nominauit et ordinauit dominum Dauid
liel suum legitimum procuratorem actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam et
Integram potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum
plegium super patricium arthour' porrectum

The saide day Dauid broys' one that ane part Ande Dondald' baxtar one that vthir part
was oblist and suorne the gret bodelie aithe to stand' and abid' at the finale
decret Sentence arbitrale of Dauid theman William Wallace chosin
for the said' Dauid and William colp and Dauid talyour chosin for the said' Donald'
and thomas leslie ourman Anent the gudis of airschip vthir gudis dettis and of
ale and Sindrie clamys and contrauersiis and debatis debatabile betuix thame and thai
sal caus' the said' personis tak the said' matiris to thame and euere mane ger'
thar' personis be Sourne tharto and Syt and conuen' tharto in ane competent place
and giffurtht thar finale decret arbitrale betuix this and the first day of
Nouembir nest' hereftir quhilkis iiijor personis was Suorne to tak the said' matir to
thame and deliuer and furthtgif thar decret within the said' day but fraude or gile
except' the said' William Colp that Is nocht suorne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in p futy xiij die mensis
octobris anno quo supra

The said' day Androw Johnesone was in ane Amerciament of the Court in falt of
presence as he that was lauchfullie warnit and nocht comperit et cetera

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' ser Johne ruthirfurd'
forspekar that Androw genour sale serue James Colisone and Dauid fynne
as ane botisman quhile the Rud' day next to cum And' the said' James
gaf ane franche crovne to Thome of touy tharof xij s' aving to him
and his botismen and ij s' to the said' William genour in onwartis of his fee of this
half yer' to cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis
octobris anno quo supra

The said' day Jonhne lyntone grauntit him aving to Androw lousone four' li'
xiiij s' and vij d' Scottis money quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law And' atour the said Johne grantit him aving to the saide Androw
Nyne li' and xj s' to be pait at the fest of Sanct Androw next hereftir

The said day thomas touy said' he was Redy with William genour and ane seruand'
of his with him to serue James Colisone and Dauid fynne in thar' boit and thai hed'
vthir botemene with thame protestand' for thar costis and Skathis

The said' day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johne Cullane
forspekar that thome touy Williame genour and the said' thomas mane
awe to serue James Colisone and Dauid fynne eftir the tenor of the
actis maid' tharapon' Obefor

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdenn' tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimosexto
die mensis Octroberis Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo Sexto

The said day the bailyes assignit monunday cum xv dais to Androu Johnesoune
quhitffischear to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johne of cullan for the
wranguis takin of the sale of the said' Johnnez bait and sail saland
in ane vthir mannis bait

The said day Androw Johnnesoun' was conuict be ane suorne assis' Williame
colp forspekar for the tribulance of Johnne colisoun' bailye in word for the
quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the Court and to amend as lawe
will and forbeir in tyme to cum And' the said Johnne quyt of ale tribulance
of the said Androw be the said assis'

The said day Androw Johnesone' was conuict be ane suorn' assis' William
colp forspekar for the tribulance of normund lesly officiar in the doing
of his office for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and'
to amend as law will and forbeir in tyme to cum And' the said normund
quyt of ale tribulance of the said Androw And' the amendis to be considerit
be the counsaile one monunday that nixt cumis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis octobris anno quo supra

The said' day Johne of balcromy grantit him avande to Johne of auchneiwe
tuentj s' Scottis money quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The saide day William Coupar tailyour was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
of mar' forspekar for tribulance of Androw Smitht for the quhilkis he was
in amerciament of the Court et cetera Atour' It was ordanit and deliuerit be the said assis'
gif euire the said Williame trubulis ony persone vndir Cilence of the nicht
and beis conuict' tharof he salbe expellit the toune

The said' day Williame vicar' grauntit him aving to margaret litstar ane barrele of grils'
scho payand' to him xxiiij s' Ande falyeing tharof to pay alsmekile vsuale money of
Scotlande for the said' j barrele of girls as ony barrele of girls' gevis within the said' burghe
the said' xxiiij s' being allouit tharintile quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of lawe

The said' day Alexander prat grantit him aving to Alexander nory xxj s' quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay to mathou branche procuratour to the said' Alexander nory within terme of law

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to Johne Crak
tile ansuer' perempturlie tile Dauid arnot for the wranguis' haldin fra him of tene franche
crovnis
